select s.*,scq.quotation_unit,scq.id as scqId,scq.preferential_setting,scq.total_price,scq.cardboard_quotation, pds.ridgeType,pds.`name` from supplier s left join supplier_cardboard_quotation scq on s.id =scq.supplier_id left join paperboard_data_setting pds on scq.pager_Id = pds.id where s.is_deleted =0
and scq.code like concat('%', #{code} , '%')
and scq.abbreviation like concat('%', #{abbreviation} , '%')
and scq.created_time like concat('%', #{time} , '%')
